title: Beads Doctor Result
description: Schema for the output of the 'bd doctor --json' command.

path.description: The filesystem path that was checked.

checks.description: A list of health checks performed.

overall_ok.description: A boolean indicating if all checks passed without errors.

cli_version.description: The version of the beads CLI that ran the check.

DoctorCheck.description: The result of a single health check.

message.description: A human-readable message describing the result of the check.

detail.description: Optional additional details about the check result.

fix.description: An optional suggested fix for any issues found.
